education.area: Science in Automation & Computer Science and Technology
courses: Robot Design and Practice, Digital Image Processing, Control Theory, etc.
Algorithm Design and Analysis, Operating System, Compilation Principle, etc.

awards.title: National Scholarship
awards.summary: The National Scholarship is the highest-level national scholarship that current Chinese higher education students can receive. Its evaluation process is the most standardized and its criteria are the strictest.

awards.title: RoboMaster University Championship
awards.summary: The RoboMaster University Series (RMU) is a platform for robotic competitions and academic exchange founded by DJI, and was specially designed for global technology enthusiasts. It requires participants to go beyond their textbooks to form robotics teams, develop a diverse fleet of robots, and participate in team battles.It attracts engineering talents with interdisciplinary abilities and showcases the possibilities of technological innovation to audiences around the globe.

awards.title: National Undergraduate Electronics Design Contest
awards.summary: The National Undergraduate Electronics Design Contest is a mass science and technology activity aimed at college students. It is the largest, most widely participated in, and highly influential electronic design contest for college students in China.

awards.title: National Undergraduate Smart Car Contest
awards.summary: The National Undergraduate Smart Car Contest is a Category A science and technology contest advocated by the Ministry of Education. It is considered one of the most prestigious college student contests by the China Association of Higher Education(CAHE).

awards.title: China Undergraduate Mathematical Contest in Modeling
awards.summary: The China Undergraduate Mathematical Contest in Modeling was founded in 1992 and is held annually. It has become the largest foundational academic contest among universities in China and is also the world's largest mathematical modeling contest in terms of scale.

awards.title: National Undergraduate Smart Car Contest
awards.summary: The National Undergraduate Smart Car Contest is a Category A science and technology contest advocated by the Ministry of Education. It is considered one of the most prestigious college student contests by the China Association of Higher Education(CAHE).

awards.title: Mathematical Contest in Modeling
awards.summary: COMAP's Mathematical Contest in Modeling (MCM) are international contests for high school students and college undergraduates. The contests challenge teams of up to three students to analyze, model, solve, and present solution reports to an open-ended application problem.

awards.title: China Undergraduate Mathematical Contest in Modeling
awards.summary: The China Undergraduate Mathematical Contest in Modeling was founded in 1992 and is held annually. It has become the largest foundational academic contest among universities in China and is also the world's largest mathematical modeling contest in terms of scale.
